description:
While Peter weeps in his cell, an Elite Hobgoblin named Gobuko unexpectedly comes to his rescue. It`s almost as though she’s got something on her mind…
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Peter Grill and the Goblin Who Returned the Favor
Peter Grill et la gratitude du gobelin
Peter Grill to Goblin no Ongaeshi
ピーター・グリルとゴブリンの恩返し
